|cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML02G200TFI00 |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=Spansion |fla2_model=S25FL032PIF |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ4G63CFR-RDC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, |serial=yes,, console,, RJ45,, |wi1_module=Broadcom BCM943460MC |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43460 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Broadcom BCM943465MC |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43465 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211F |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8211F |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN RF Front End Module ;Skyworks;SE5516;;3; ,,, 5GHz WLAN RF Front End Module ;Skyworks;SKY85806-11;;4; |flags=Dual WAN |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=cisco |default_pass=cisco |oui=5C:50:15 |oui_eth=5C:50:15 }} {{TagLine|Dual WAN Gigabit Wireless-AC VPN Router}} :[https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/rv340w-dual-gigabit-wan-wireless-ac-vpn-router/index.html Product page] {{•}} [https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/routers/rv340w-dual-gigabit-wan-wireless-ac-vpn-router/model.html Support page]
Default settings are per the FCC manual and label.
A label affixed to the FCC EUT seems to indicate... :Some devices may use a 5C:50:15 (''[[Cisco]]'') OUI :The default SSID pattern may be '''cisco-XXXX'''
*[http://blog.router-switch.com/2017/07/cisco-rv340w-vpn-router-for-any-small-business-network-that-requires/ ''Cisco RV340W'' on '''Router-Switch''' blogs] :CPU: [[Freescale]] ([[NXP]]) [https://www.nxp.com/products/microcontrollers-and-processors/arm-based-processors-and-mcus/qoriq-layerscape-arm-processors/qoriq-layerscape-1024a-dual-core-communications-processor:LS1024A LS1024A] @1.2GHz
